Clip.Title: THE REAL STORY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Go behind the scenes and learn about some of the real individuals who were protrayed in Scorsese's 1995 film.

Clip.Title: THE WORLD OF SOUND
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The original "indie" label, Folkways Records took a strikingly different path from the rest of the music industry. Gathering together all sounds - from blues and jazz to folk and gospel - Folkways truly defined where music hits the heartbeat right around the world.

Clip.Title: L.A. FROCK STARS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Being L.A.'s "vintage fashion guru" means that Doris Raymond must maintain the best inventory in the city and she makes sure the whole town knows about her timeless pieces. See how she generates priceless word of mouth when international trendsetter Jason Campbell pays her a visit.

Clip.Title: L.A. FROCK STARS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Join the bidding war and discover what it takes to make it in the increasingly competitive world of vintage fashion. Follow Doris, along with her store manager Sarah and fashion consultant Kyle, as they fly to New York and prepare to bid at the highly competitive Augusta Auction - one of the few auction houses in America that specializes solely in vintage clothing, rare textiles, and costume jewelry. This shopping spree will put Doris and her team to the test.

Clip.Title: THE REAL STORY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Go behind the scenes and learn about some of the real individuals who were protrayed in Scorsese's 1995 film.

Clip.Title: AERIAL FRANCE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Get an up close look at the beautiful French landscape from above and a taste of the rich culture on the stunning coasts.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the port city of Halifax, to the historic Acadian shores and international waters beyond, this aerial exploration documents the treasures and mysteries of Nova Scotia's Southern coast.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: CANNIBAL ISLAND
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Amidst the purges of the Stalin-era, dissidents sent to a remote prison camp resort to desperate measures to survive.

Clip.Title: COLDITZ THE LEGEND
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Colditz- a Caste near Leipzig in Germany- was the most feared POW Facility of WW2. This exciting and moving new documentary takes a fresh look at the legend, hearing from both Colditz survivors and their families.

Clip.Title: A STORY OF PEOPLE IN WAR AND PEACE
Clip.Episode: A Story Of People in War and Peace
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Live alongside Armenian soldiers caught in the Karabakh war (89-94) and reunite with them in present day as they search to find answers to the war and lessons for peace.

Clip.Title: I HAVE SEEN THE EARTH CHANGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Farmers in the interior of the country are struggling to make ends meet as Climate Change dries out their crops.

Clip.Title: I HAVE SEEN THE EARTH CHANGE
Clip.Episode: Nepal: Cracks at the Roof of the World
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Solukhumbu contains most of the 3300 glaciers and 2300 artic lakes of Nepal. Glacier recession, which have given birth to new lakes where there was only ice and snow. Those lakes are a danger for the population, natural bombs, ready to explode.

Clip.Title: THE BIONIC VET
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Veterinary surgeon must fix cross border collie Sasha's blown disk with a specially designed bolt to insert into her spine, and he must save a cat maimed by a car.

Clip.Title: UNDERSEA EDENS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: At the edge of Western Australia's dry and desolate desert lies a marine reserve known as Ningaloo Reef. Ningaloo is one of the world's largest fringing reefs, and it stretches north to south for over 180 miles. And even though It's only 2% the size of the Great Barrier Reef, it rivals it in diversity.

Clip.Title: GHOST CAT: SAVING THE CLOUDED LEOPARD
Clip.Episode: Ghost Cat: Saving the Clouded Leopard
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Trek deep into the forest of Southeast Asia to unravel the mystery of this enigmatic feline.

Clip.Title: TIGER TALES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The story of the upbringing of 3 newborn Tigers at the Smithsonian National Zoo.

Clip.Title: DUGONG AND DIN
Clip.EpisodeSummary: A boy forges an incredible relationship with one of the world's rarest and little known mammals- the Dugong, or sea cow.

Clip.Title: THE BIONIC VET
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Veterinary surgeon must fix cross border collie Sasha's blown disk with a specially designed bolt to insert into her spine, and he must save a cat maimed by a car.

Clip.Title: UNDERSEA EDENS

Ningaloo is one of the world's largest fringing reefs, and it stretches north to south for over 180 miles. And even though It's only 2% the size of the Great Barrier Reef, it rivals it in diversity.
